name: Chips of Fury: Friendly Poker
description:
Chips of Fury (CoF) is made specially for playing private games with your friends and family. Not only can you play fully virtually, with variations such as Texas Hold'em, Omaha and Omaha 5... You can also play using just "Virtual Poker Chips" and your own cards.

UNIQUE FEATURES
- Dealer's Choice Style of play
Start the game in any variation (like Texas Hold'em), and switch to any other variation on any hand. Currently supported: Texas Hold'em, Omaha and Omaha 5. More variations are coming soon!

- Seamless in-app chat
The chat UX is beautifully integrated for easy of use, and keeping a track of the gameplay at all times.

- Optional Clock (Turn Timers)
In home games, many times you don't want a clock. Players can choose to play fast or slow. It is great for teaching newbies how to play as well. In case you want a faster gameplay, you can enable turn timers - configurable from 15 seconds to 1 minute.

- A unique "chips only" mode
When you want to play offline and don't have a poker chipset - The virtual chips have customizable denominations and are unlimited in number. Pot settlement supports side pots, hi-lo splits, winner takes all, or completely custom settlements by just entering the amounts manually.

- Play non-poker games using the Chips Only mode
Usage of virtual chips is not limited to offline poker games. Online games can also be played using third party virtual cards. Chips of Fury acts as a great companion app for the chips and betting. Many games such as Teen Patti, Flash, Seven Twenty-seven, Stud Poker, Guts, Draw Poker etc. work seamlessly.

Hope you give Chips of Fury a try. Feel free to send feature requests, and other suggestions too. Would love to hear how the app can be improved.

Disclaimer:
Chips of Fury is a casual app meant for playing card games. We do not take responsibility for any financial transactions related to betting. Any bugs may be reported at hi.kanily@gmail.com.
